usefulItems: baking dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm), oven
title: Carrot and Peanut Bake

ingredients.content: 30 g olive oil, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and grease a baking dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm).
Place bread in mixing bowl then grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl then remove 2 Tbsp breadcrumbs and set aside in a separate bowl.
Place peanuts in mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to bowl with larger portion of breadcrumbs.
Place carrots and onions in mixing bowl then chop <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.

Add tomatoes, soya milk, oil, eggs, salt, reserved peanuts and breadcrumbs then mix <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to prepared baking dish and sprinkle reserved 2 Tbsp breadcrumbs over the top. Bake for 45 minutes (180°C) until browned and crunchy on top.
